name: Iliohypogastric nerve
text: Iliohypogastric nerve arises from T12–L1 and supplies sensation to the lower abdominal wall.

name: Ilioinguinal nerve
text: Ilioinguinal nerve arises from L1 and provides sensory innervation to the groin region.

name: Genitofemoral nerve
text: Genitofemoral nerve arises from L1–L2 and supplies sensation to the groin and upper thigh.

name: Obturator nerve
text: Obturator nerve arises from L2–L4 and innervates the medial thigh compartment.

name: Lateral femoral cutaneous nerve
text: Lateral femoral cutaneous nerve arises from L2–L3 and supplies sensation to the anterolateral thigh.

name: Femoral nerve
text: Femoral nerve arises from L2–L4 and innervates the anterior thigh.

name: Tibial nerve
text: Tibial nerve arises from L4–S3 and innervates the posterior leg and plantar foot.

name: Nerve to quadratus femoris
text: Nerve to quadratus femoris arises from L4–S1 and supplies deep external rotators of the hip.

name: Nerve to obturator internus
text: Nerve to obturator internus arises from L5–S2 and innervates obturator internus and gemelli.

name: Pudendal nerve
text: Pudendal nerve arises from S2–S4 and supplies the perineum.

name: Coccygeus nerve
text: Coccygeus nerve arises from S4 and contributes to pelvic floor innervation.

name: Levator ani nerve
text: Levator ani nerve arises from S3–S4 and innervates pelvic floor musculature.

name: Peroneal nerve (common fibular)
text: Common peroneal nerve arises from L4–S2 and innervates the anterior and lateral leg.

name: Superior gluteal nerve
text: Superior gluteal nerve arises from L4–S1 and innervates gluteus medius and minimus.

name: Inferior gluteal nerve
text: Inferior gluteal nerve arises from L5–S2 and innervates gluteus maximus.

name: Nerve to piriformis
text: Nerve to piriformis arises from S2 and innervates piriformis muscle.

name: Posterior femoral cutaneous nerve
text: Posterior femoral cutaneous nerve arises from S1–S3 and supplies sensation to the posterior thigh.
